    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78679</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78679</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Évidence du mouvement tectonique de plat</string>
            <string language="en">Evidence of tectonic plate movement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beweis der tectonic Platte Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evidência do movimento tectonic da placa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova del movimento tettonico della piastra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία της τεκτονικής μετακίνησης πιάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evidencia del movimiento tectónico de la placa</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette carte prouve que la forme de l'Afrique et celle de l'Amérique  s'assemblent et que des fossiles semblables de fougère et de reptiles sont trouvés dans les deux endroits.  Ces résultats nous indiquent que les deux endroits devaient n'en faire qu'un il y a des millions d'années.</string>
            <string language="en">This map shows that the shape of Africa and South America fit together and similar fossils of fern and reptiles are found in both places. These findings tell us that the two places must have been together millions of years ago.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'Afrique</string>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dérive continentale</string>
            <string language="en">continental drift</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fougère</string>
            <string language="en">Fern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lithosphère</string>
            <string language="en">Lithosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">reptiles</string>
            <string language="en">reptiles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Amérique du sud</string>
            <string language="en">South America</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plats tectoniques</string>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">manteau supérieur</string>
            <string language="en">upper mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte zeigt, daß die Form von Afrika und 
Südamerika, das zusammen gepaßt werden und ähnliche Fossilien des 
Farns und Reptilien in beiden Plätzen gefunden werden. Diese 
Entdeckungen erklären uns, daß die zwei Plätze zusammen gewesen 
sein müssen Millionen Jahre vor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa mostra que a forma de África e 
Ámérica do Sul cabida junto e os fossils similares do fern e os 
répteis estão encontrados em ambos os lugares. Estes findings 
dizem-nos que os dois lugares devem ter sido junto milhões dos anos 
há.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma indica che la figura dell'Africa
ed il Sudamerica misura insieme ed i fossili simili del fern ed i 
rettili sono trovati in entrambi i posti. Questi risultati ci 
dicono che i due posti debbano essere insieme milioni di anni fa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης δείχνει ότι η μορφή της Αφρικής και 
της Νότιας Αμερικής κατάλληλων μαζί και τα παρόμοια απολιθώματα 
της φτέρης και τα ερπετά βρίσκονται και σε ισχύ οι δύο. 
Αυτά τα συμπεράσματα μας λένε ότι οι δύο θέσεις πρέπει να
είναι μαζί εκατομμύρια των ετών πριν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia muestra que la dimensión de 
una variable de África y Suramérica cabida juntas y los fósiles 
similares del fern y los reptiles están encontrados en ambos lugares.
Estos resultados nos dicen que los dos lugares deban haber sido 
juntos millones hace de años.</string>
          </description>
